scripts.book-client-deve-run: cd book/client && npm run deve && cd ../..
scripts.book-client-stag-build: cd book/client && npm run staging && cd ../..
scripts.book-client-prod-build: cd book/client && npm run production && cd ../..
scripts.book-worker-deve-run: cd book/service-worker && npm run deve && cd ../..
scripts.book-worker-stag-build: cd book/service-worker && npm run stag && cd ../..
scripts.book-worker-prod-build: cd book/service-worker && npm run prod && cd ../..
scripts.book-stag-build-front: npm run book-worker-stag-build && npm run book-client-stag-build
scripts.book-prod-build-front: npm run book-worker-prod-build && npm run book-client-prod-build
scripts.book-stag-deploy-front: npm run book-client-stag-deploy && npm run book-client-stag-invalidate
scripts.book-prod-deploy-front: npm run book-client-prod-deploy && npm run book-client-prod-invalidate
scripts.book-stag-build: npm run book-stag-build-front && npm run book-server-stag-build
scripts.book-prod-build: npm run book-prod-build-front && npm run book-server-prod-build
scripts.book-stag-deploy: npm run book-stag-deploy-front && npm run book-server-stag-deploy
scripts.book-prod-deploy: npm run book-prod-deploy-front && npm run book-server-prod-deploy
scripts.book-deve: concurrently 'npm run book-client-deve-run' 'npm run book-client-deve-codegen' 'npm run book-server-deve-watch' 'npm run book-server-deve-run' 'npm run book-server-deve-stripe'
scripts.book-stag-front: npm run book-stag-build-front && npm run book-stag-deploy-front
scripts.book-prod-front: npm run book-prod-build-front && npm run book-prod-deploy-front
scripts.book-stag: npm run book-stag-build && npm run book-stag-deploy
scripts.book-prod: npm run book-prod-build && npm run book-prod-deploy
